verses.text: Mamin Jehová, manh in a tumej yed' yoval a k'ool. Manh ak' in yaelal ayic scot oval d'ayin.
Mamin, ok'oc val a k'ool d'ayin, yujto manhxalaj vip svab'i. Mamin, ak'xi b'ox in k'ool yujto a in nivanil tic sluclon yuj manh ipal.
Te somchajnac in k'ool. A achxo Mamin Jehová, ¿b'aq'uinh ol ach och ved'oc?
Mamin Jehová, ochanh val q'uelan d'ayin, colinel yed' val a nivan vach'k'olal.
¿Tom ay mach olto ach naancotoc ayic toxo ix chami? Malaj junoc mach ol b'itan d'ayach d'a scal eb' yetchamnaquil chi'.
Ste el vip voq'ui. Manh jantacoc vok' d'a junjun ak'val. Sch'ayxiel in k'anh jolom yuj yal in sat.
Maxtzac yal-laj vilani, yujto ix mal in sat voq'ui yujnhej eb' ayoch ajk'olal d'ayin.
Elanhec d'a in tz'ey a ex to anhej chucal tze k'ulej. Toxo ix yab' Jehová in sik'sik'an voq'ui.
Toxo ix yab' in tevi d'ay. Toxo ix scha in lesal.
A eb' ayoch ajk'olal d'ayin, ol can eb' d'a q'uixvelal. Tonhej ol somchajcanel eb'. D'a junnhej mutz'satil ol can eb' d'a q'uixvelk'olal.
